name: Hazelnut Bastille Demo
description: Hazelnut Bastille is a topdown, Zelda-like ARPG currently in development, which seeks to capture the essence of the 16bit era of games.  The demo offers players a vertical slice experience of simplified mechanics intended for the full game, and takes approximately 2-3 hours to complete. Controllers are highly recommended! We are currently offering the demo for Windows on Itch.io, although it can be found for Mac and Linux via the Newsletter on our landing page:( https://www.aloftstudio.com/hazelnutbastille )
